titleStmt.title: Memorable dayes and workes of God, in the yeare past. 1645. Or A catalogue of the cities, castles, townes, and forts, that have beene taken by the Parliaments forces since Ianuary last.
titleStmt.author: Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Joseph Caryl by Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 1st 1645"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
